attributes.action: Awareness and Tackling of School Bullying leading to Child Suicide
attributes.additional_details: To raise awareness within the school system for tackling and promoting anti-bullying programs. To give school staff better understanding of problems faced and staff and schools have better abilities to impose penalties. Also to prevent school age suicides by introducing harsher penalties to those reponsible for bullying, i.e. department of justice, home office and cabinet office.
